description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For Task–Based Informatics Professional Service: Requirements for services (TBIPS)
tags: Task Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TBIPS)
full_summary:
### Canadian Space Agency Tender Notice
#### Request for Proposal for Task-Based Informatics Professional Service: Requirements for services (TBIPS)

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of a Programmer Analyst for a four or five-day workweek to support the Agency's needs in informatics services. The work is expected to be performed in a predominantly virtual mode, with the possibility of occasional on-site presence at the CSA's office in St-Hubert, QC.

**Tender Details**

*   Title: A.7 - Programmer Analyst - TBIPS - CSA
*   ID Number: PW-23-01020513
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Solicitation Number: 9F019-22-0115
*   Publication Date: January 9, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: February 8, 2023 2:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   GSIN: D302A - Informatics Professional Services
*   UNSPSC: None
*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**

The selection criteria for this RFP are not specified.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers**

This requirement is open only to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TBIPS), # EN578-170432/B.

**Contract Details**

*   The contract will be for a duration of one year or more after the award date.
*   The contractor will be responsible for providing a Programmer Analyst to work four or five days a week on a project-defined basis.
*   The contract authority for this project is Julie Mercier (julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca, +1 438-270-5868).

**Submission Guidelines**

Interested suppliers must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP document. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. L’État se réserve le droit de négocier avec tout fournisseur dans le cadre de tout marché.

**Important Notes**

*   The RFP documents can be obtained on Canada Buys website.
*   Bidders are advised to carefully review the RFP document and any amendments thereto.
